tool_description: An API generates a short link for an anime image
name: Random anime img
title: Random anime img

api_list.name: random img anime
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-anime-img.p.rapidapi.com/anime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-anime-img.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
